channel.title: Posts on Giacomo Bignardi

item.title: The Perks of Buliding a Website
item.description: BIO via GIPHY Giacomo Bignardi born in the humanities, with a degree in Drama, Art and Music Studies from the University of Bologna. He was then raised by scientists while doing a minor in Brain and Mind, leaving home to research at the Complex Trait Genetic department at the Vrije Universiteit in Amsterdam. After, he tried to grow up in London, studying Neuroaesthetics at Goldsmiths, University of London, and collaborating with the NTR, at the Biological Psychology Dept.
